Article Title: Like commercial vehicles, soon private vehicles need to get fitness test done at automated testing stations
Article Text:
Representational photo

NEW DELHI: Soon all private vehicles like cars and bikes will have to get their fitness and pollution tests done at automated test stations (ATS) for renewal of registration as it is in the case of commercial vehicles. The ATS or the inspecting officer will also need to upload at least a 10 seconds geotagged video of the vehicle at the time of fitness test before issuing any certificate.The road transport ministry has proposed key changes in the Central Motor Vehicles Rules, including this, through a draft notification to prevent the malpractice of vehicle owners managing to get fitness certificates even without visiting ATS or other testing centres. This also gains significance in the light of increasing concern over air pollution and fitness of vehicles.Fitness certificate is mandatory for renewal of registration of private vehicles after attaining 15 years, and subsequently, in every five years.As per the draft notification, private vehicles, like commercial ones, will need to visit ATS, where these are established, for fitness tests. At present, there are over 160 ATS operational across the country.To ensure that the certificates are issued after carrying out genuine tests, the draft notification says that ‚Äúthe renewal of a certificate of fitness shall be made only after uploading at least a 10 seconds geotagged video of the vehicle at the time of fitness test, capturing the vehicle from front, rear, right side and left side ensuring clear visibility of the registration number plate, chassis number, engine number and features of the vehicle‚Äù by an authorised testing station or inspecting officer after carrying out the specified tests.In a bid to avoid vehicle owners using legal provisions to apply for multiple re-tests after vehicles fail to pass the fitness test, the proposed norms say that if a vehicle is not declared as ‚Äòfit‚Äô within 180 days from the first date of vehicle declared as ‚Äòunfit‚Äô the vehicle shall be categorised as ‚ÄòEnd of Life Vehicle (ELV)‚Äô and flagged in the Vahan database as ‚ÄòELV‚Äô.Officials said till now people used to get the timeline extended by simply submitting fees just days before the expiry of 180 days. ‚ÄúThat won‚Äôt be possible any more. They need to get the fitness certificate within 180 days from the day the first test found the vehicle as unfit. Enough safeguards have been put in place to ensure that any ATS doesn‚Äôt give incorrect test result,‚Äù said an official.
Article Summary: The road transport ministry has proposed key changes in the central motor vehicles rules. The ats or the inspecting officer will also need to upload at least a 10 seconds geotagged video of the vehicle at the time of fitness test before issuing any certificate.

Article Title: Videos, automated tests to tackle vehicle fitness fraud
Article Text:
Vehicle fitness fraud

NEW DELHI: The malpractice of getting fitness certificates, including PUC, home-delivered without taking vehicles to test centres for renewal of registration will soon be a thing of the past.In a draft notification proposing major changes in motor vehicle rules, the transport ministry has proposed to make it mandatory for private vehicles to get fitness and pollution tests done at automated test stations (ATS). The ATS or the inspecting officer will also need to upload at least a 10-second geo-tagged video of the vehicle at the time of the fitness test before issuing any certificate.The road transport ministry has proposed key chan-ges in the central motor vehicle rules through a draft notification. This gains significance in light of increasing concern over air pollution. A fitness certificate is mandatory for renewal of registration of private vehicles over 15 years old, and subsequently, every five years.According to the draft notification, private vehicles, like commercial ones, will need to visit ATS for fitness tests. At present, there are over 160 ATS operational across the country.To ensure that the certificates are issued after carrying out genuine tests, the draft notification says "the renewal of a certificate of fitness shall be made only after uploading at least a 10 second geo-tagged video of the vehicle at the time of fitness test, capturing the vehicle from front, rear, right side and left side ensuring clear visibility of the registration number plate, chassis number, engine number and features of the vehicle" by an authorised testing station or inspecting officer after carrying out the tests.In a bid to avoid vehicle owners using legal provisions to apply for multiple re-tests after vehicles fail to pass, the proposed norms say that if a vehicle is not declared 'fit' within 180 days from the first date of being deemed 'unfit', it shall be categorised as 'End of Life Vehicle (ELV)' and flagged in the Vahan database as 'ELV'.Officials said people got their timeline extended by simply submitting fees before expiry of 180 days. "That won't be possible. They need to get the fitness certificate within 180 days from the day the first test found the vehicle as unfit. Enough safeguards have been put in place to ensure any ATS doesn't give incorrect test result," said an official.
Article Summary: The road transport ministry has proposed key chan-ges in the central motor vehicle rules. A fitness certificate is mandatory for renewal of registration of private vehicles over 15 years old, and subsequently, every five years. The ats or the inspecting officer will also need to upload at least a 10-second geo-tagged video of the vehicle.

Article Title: ‚ÄòSignificant role in strengthening governance‚Äô: Centre launches e-bill system for fertilizer subsidies; platform to digitise workflow
Article Text:
.

Union fertilizers minister J P Nadda on Thursday inaugurated an integrated e-bill system aimed at digitally processing fertilizer subsidies of about Rs 2 lakh crore. The move replaces manual, paper-based procedures with a fully digital workflow, eliminating the physical movement of bills, an official statement said."This online system will play a significant role in strengthening transparent, efficient and technology-driven governance," Nadda said at the launch event, as cited by PTI.The initiative is a key outcome of a technological collaboration between the Department of Fertilizers‚Äô Integrated Financial Management System (iFMS) and the Public Financial Management System (PFMS) of the controller general of accounts under the ministry of finance.The transformation "significantly enhances transparency and accountability by creating a centralised and tamper-proof digital audit trail for all financial transactions, thereby facilitating easier monitoring and audits," said CGA Santosh Kumar.The e-bill platform allows fertilizer companies to submit subsidy claims online and monitor payment status in real time, removing the need for physical visits and manual follow-ups.It introduces a standardised electronic workflow, including first-in-first-out bill processing, to ensure consistency and adherence to financial rules.The system offers real-time oversight of expenditure and stronger financial controls, with all payments tracked and reported through a central platform.Manoj Sethi, joint secretary in the fertilizers ministry, said the system ‚Äúenables end-to-end digital bill processing, which will significantly accelerate payment timelines, including timely release of weekly fertilizer subsidy payments‚Äù.The system also incorporates robust internal controls that validate payments against predefined criteria, record every action for audit purposes, and help reduce the risk of fraud.The event was attended by additional secretaries Aneeta C Meshram and Aparna Sharma, joint secretaries K K Pathak and Anurag Rohatagi, and director Laboni Das Datta.Senior Technical Director Aseem Gupta of the National Informatics Centre (NIC) outlined the technical features and architecture of the system.The implementation and demonstration were supported by the NIC team, including joint director Ashutosh Tiwari and developer Harekrishna Tiwari, whose efforts in building and rolling out the platform were widely appreciated.
Article Summary: Union fertilizers minister j p nadda on thursday inaugurated an integrated e-bill system aimed at digitally processing fertilizer subsidies of about rs 2 lakh crore. The move replaces manual, paper-based procedures with a fully digital workflow, eliminating the physical movement of bills.

Article Title: Viral NYE video shows Tom Brady and Alix Earle getting cozy together, sparks dating rumors and age-gap chatter
Article Text:
Image - X

The viral St. Barths video showing Tom Brady and Alix Earle together





In a new and now viral clip, Tom Brady and social media star Alix Earle were caught on camera sharing some close and cozy moments during a New Year‚Äôs Eve party in St. Barths. Fans are buzzing online, speculating about a potential romance, but what do we actually know? Here‚Äôs a breakdown of the footage, confirmed details, and what‚Äôs still just rumor.Multiple videos published by fans and other outlets show Brady and Earle standing and talking closely at a New Year‚Äôs Eve party. In some clips, Earle is seen leaning in and lightly touching Brady‚Äôs back as they interact. Short videos also show them dancing together and enjoying the party, sparking widespread attention on social media.Alix Earle recently ended her relationship with NFL wide receiver Braxton Berrios, citing a desire to focus on herself after a long-distance dynamic. This breakup has fueled fan interest in any new interactions she has with high-profile figures like Brady.Her public persona as a social media influencer ensures that moments like this are quickly amplified online. The combination of Tom Brady‚Äôs celebrity status, Alix Earle‚Äôs social media influence, and the intimate-feeling footage made this a viral sensation. Fans and gossip outlets have speculated wildly, sharing GIFs, clips, and commentary across Instagram, TikTok, and Twitter/X.Celebrity culture and the timing around New Year‚Äôs celebrations also helped the clips gain traction, making this one of the most talked-about moments online over the holiday weekend.Fans have also highlighted the age gap in discussions about the viral St. Barths video. While the clips only show them interacting closely, the age difference has been a talking point on social media alongside the dating speculation.But neither Brady nor Earle has issued any public statements about the interaction or rumors. Fans should watch for future public appearances or social media posts that might confirm or deny any romantic link. For now, the videos remain a fun, viral holiday moment without verified confirmation of a relationship.Also read - Good news: Lamar Jackson practices again and looks on track to start AFC North title game vs. Steelers
Article Summary: The viral st. barths video showing tom brady and alix earle together has become a viral sensation. Fans and gossip outlets have speculated wildly, sharing gifs, clips, and commentary. Neither brady nor earle has issued any public statements about the interaction or rumors.

Article Title: Micah Parsons vs CeeDee Lamb net worth in 2025: Who is richer, nfl career earnings, endorsements, and more
Article Text:
Micah Parsons vs CeeDee Lamb net worth in 2025: Who is richer, nfl career earnings, endorsements, and more (Image Via Getty)

How Micah Parsons built his contract money and career earnings in the NFL

How CeeDee Lamb‚Äôs contract extension and total earnings show his rise as an NFL star

Micah Parsons vs CeeDee Lamb: Endorsements and off-field income

Micah Parsons vs CeeDee Lamb: Who is richer right now and what‚Äôs next





Micah Parsons and CeeDee Lamb are two of the biggest stars on the Dallas Cowboys roster. Both are young, famous, and earning serious money in the NFL. Fans often ask the same thing when their names come up together. Who is richer right now? The answer comes down to contracts, endorsements, and how far each career has gone so far.Micah Parsons entered the NFL in 2021 as a first-round pick by the Dallas Cowboys. He signed a four-year rookie contract worth about $17 million, fully guaranteed.The Cowboys also picked up his fifth-year option, which keeps him under contract through the 2025 season. As of now, Micah Parsons has earned most of his money from NFL salary and bonuses.He has not yet signed a massive long-term extension, but league insiders expect one soon because he is one of the best defensive players in football.CeeDee Lamb took a big financial leap in August 2024 when he signed a four-year, $136 million extension with the Dallas Cowboys.That deal included a record signing bonus for a wide receiver at the time and made him one of the highest-paid non-quarterbacks in the league.Before that extension, CeeDee Lamb played on his rookie contract after being drafted in 2020.Because of this new deal, his career earnings already sit higher than Micah Parsons at this stage.Both players make money away from the field. Micah Parsons has endorsement deals with brands like Nike, Old Spice, and energy drink companies.These deals add steady income each year. CeeDee Lamb is even more active in the brand space.He works with Bose, BODYARMOR, and fashion brands, and he appears often in national ads. Endorsements play a big role in why CeeDee Lamb‚Äôs overall net worth is higher right now.At this moment, CeeDee Lamb is richer based on confirmed contracts and endorsement reach. His long-term extension gives him a clear edge. Micah Parsons, however, could change everything once he signs his next deal.In recent months, Parsons has publicly said he wants to stay in Dallas and focus on winning, not contract drama. Once his extension arrives, the money gap could close fast.Also Read: Jaxson Dart Vs Travis Hunter Net Worth In 2025: Who Is Richer, NIL Deals, Early Fame And More
Article Summary: Micah parsons and ceedee lamb are two of the biggest stars on the dallas cowboys roster. Both are young, famous, and earning serious money in the nfl. Who is richer right now? The answer comes down to contracts, endorsements, and how far each career has gone so far.

Article Title: Elon Musk's net worth: The world's richest man becomes the first ever with $600 billion worth amid SpaceX's valuation surge
Article Text:
Source: Forbes

'US Benefited Immensely From Indians', Says Tesla CEO Elon Musk, Warns US Against Scrapping H-1B

Elon Musk becomes the first person to hit a whopping figure of $600 billion in net worth





Elon Musk‚Äôs wealth surge driven by SpaceX, Tesla, and xAI





SpaceX





Tesla

xAI

Elon Musk‚Äôs rapid rise: From $24 billion to the brink of trillionaire status









Elon Musk has reached a historical financial milestone, as he has become the first-ever person to ever achieve a net worth that surpasses the whopping figure of $600 billion, as reported in Forbes magazine. This milestone has been achieved during a time when there is newfound interest in his privately owned rocket company, SpaceX, which he believes will make a historical initial start detailing a whopping value of $800 billion with an initial public offering that could potentially take place in 2026.Musk's net worth has not only increased with his involvement with his rocket company, SpaceX, but he has earned a tremendous amount of money with his investment in electric cars with his company, Tesla, where his net worth has increased by a whopping 12% because of his investment in his own artificial intelligence company, xAI.As reported by Forbes, Elon Musk has now broken yet another record by being the first individual to ever reach a net worth of over $600 billion. This achievement has come at a time when his private rocket company, SpaceX, has seen a tremendous rise in market value, with plans of an initial public offering in 2026. Musk's net worth is also contributed by his stake of 12% in Tesla, an electric vehicle behemoth, and his artificial intelligence company, xAI, both of which keep increasing in value.From groundbreaking innovations in space travel and electric mobility to ambitious AI projects, futuristic ventures, and global business expansions, Musk‚Äôs diversified portfolio and relentless pursuit of technological advancement have cemented his status as the world‚Äôs richest person.SpaceX has also showcased its role in the increasing wealth of Musk to historic levels. With an estimated 42% stake in the firm, the net worth of Musk is expected to grow by an enormous $168 billion if SpaceX continues to retain its current valuation of $800 billion. Analysts also expect it to reach a valuation of $1.5 trillion when it comes to the public market and possibly become the first trillionaire in the world. The innovative nature of SpaceX in terms of its rocket and satellite launches continues to impress the market while affecting the net worth of its CEO.Tesla stock is still an integral part of Musk‚Äôs financial network. His current stake of about 12% in Tesla is valued at $197 billion without taking into consideration the stock options from the 2018 CEO Performance Award that are still winding their way through litigation. Apart from that, Tesla shareholders have just approved what is considered the largest compensation deal of $1 trillion that is pegged on meeting various performance goals, including doubling the current market capitalization eightfold in ten years.Musk‚Äôs AI company, xAI, is also a significant contributor to his net worth. In the advanced talk of raising funding worth $15 billion in fresh equity, the firm is placed at a value of $230 billion. Musk owns about 53% of the firm‚Äôs stakes under xAI Holdings, meaning he has a net worth of about $60 billion. AI is another major sector into which Musk has ventured.Musk's emergence to $600 billion in a short span of time can be noted. He started with $24.6 billion in March 2020 and broke the $100 billion mark later in the same year, and reached $190 billion in January 2021. He broke many records in the last five years with his wealth and became the first person to break $500 billion in October 2025. At present, he leads the richest people in the world by a very large margin of $425 billion over Google co-founder Larry Page and is soon to reach $700 billion.
Article Summary: Elon musk has become the first-ever person to ever achieve a net worth that surpasses the whopping figure of $600 billion. His private rocket company, spacex, has seen a tremendous rise in market value, with plans of an initial public offering in 2026.

Article Title: Jeffrey Lurie net worth: How much the Philadelphia Eagles owner is worth in 2025
Article Text:
Image via IMAGN

What is Jeffrey Lurie‚Äôs net worth in 2025?

What is the Eagles' value today?

Investments by Jeffrey Lurie

Also Read:





Jeffrey Lurie, the owner of the Philadelphia Eagles, has quietly had one of the most successful ownership stints in NFL history. As the Eagles keep proving that they can compete year after year, interest in Lurie's wealth and business empire has only grown. His net worth in 2025 shows that he has been smart with his money for decades, not just in football.Forbes says that Jeffrey Lurie's net worth will be about $7.6 billion in 2025. That amount puts him in the top tier of American sports owners and among the richest owners in the NFL.Lurie's wealth has grown a lot in the last ten years, from little over $1 billion in the middle of the 2010s. The huge rise is mostly because NFL franchise values have skyrocketed and the Eagles have continued to do well on the field.Lurie bought the Philadelphia Eagles in 1994 for $195 million, which seems like a little amount of money by today's standards. The franchise is worth over $6.6 billion in 2025, which makes it one of the most valuable clubs in the league.The Eagles have been to the NFC Championship Game several times, the Super Bowl several times, and won two Lombardi Trophies while Lurie has owned them. Those accomplishments have made the brand far more popular and valuable around the world.Before becoming an NFL owner, Lurie made his money in the entertainment business. Philip Smith, who started General Cinema, which was once one of the biggest movie theater chains in the US, is his grandfather.Later, Lurie started Chestnut Hill Productions, a film business that made award-winning documentaries. Lurie's efforts have received several Academy Awards, which shows how powerful he is in both Hollywood and athletics.Some NFL owners keep in the background, but Lurie has been an active part of defining the culture of the organization. He has always put money into analytics, sports science, and keeping the front office stable. People have praised him for making the Eagles' football operations more modern.He also has a say in league matters, where he is seen as one of the more progressive owners. Lurie has backed a number of Democratic candidates and organizations over the years, which shows that he is involved in more than just sports.Jeffrey Lurie is 74 years old and doesn't seem to be ready to give up ownership. His net worth is certain to keep going up in the next few years as NFL TV rights deals grow and franchise values rise.For Eagles supporters, Lurie's financial strength has meant stability, ambition, and a promise to keep winning, which is an uncommon combination in professional sports.
Article Summary: Lurie bought the philadelphia eagles in 1994 for $195 million. The franchise is worth over $6.6 billion in 2025, which makes it one of the most valuable clubs in the league. His wealth has grown a lot in the last ten years, from little over $1 billion in the middle of the 2010s.

Article Title: Ex-Rockstar developer has a GTA 6 warning: ‚ÄòIf the game is delayed again‚Ä¶'
Article Text:
Former Rockstar developer Mike York warns that further delays to Grand Theft Auto 6 could significantly diminish public interest. He believes Rockstar is prioritizing polish to meet high expectations, but prolonged waits risk alienating fans. York anticipates a November 2026 release, citing it as an optimal period for sales.

‚ÄúWe‚Äôve been waiting so long for

GTA 6

already that if there was to be another delay, people will probably stop caring about its release even more. If

Rockstar

Games delay GTA 6 again then the hype around the game will die down almost completely. Right now, nobody is searching for GTA 6. Everyone knows there‚Äôs no news, there‚Äôs nothing to talk about‚Ä¶ There‚Äôs a point to where you delay something so much that you start to make people angry.‚Äù

‚ÄúPeople aren‚Äôt itching to find new details or a latest leak anymore, they‚Äôre over it. They are thinking, ‚Äòit will come out when it comes out‚Äô, as they‚Äôre so burnt out from thinking it will come out soon and then it doesn‚Äôt‚Ä¶ And then they‚Äôre like, ‚ÄòOK, whatever‚Ä¶‚Äô‚Äù

Why Ex-Rockstar developer thinks Rockstar has been delaying the game

‚ÄúIf I know Rockstar Games, and I know the guys over there, one of the reasons for the delay in releasing GTA 6 is because they‚Äôre trying to make it look as best as it can possibly be. They‚Äôre polishing stuff.

I don‚Äôt think they‚Äôre completely finished with the game, given how much is on the line and how big everyone‚Äôs expectations are for it.‚Äù

‚ÄúI think the game will be released in November 2026 as it‚Äôs a good time for the game to come out for Rockstar for multiple reasons to sell video games. If you want to sell a big amount of video games then that‚Äôs the perfect time for GTA 6 to come out with it being a month before Christmas. Usually companies only delay these things once or twice when they need to, so I think it will come out around that time,‚Äù





Former Rockstar Games developer Mike York has a critical warning for the Take-Two-owned gaming studio. He has warned that the hype and public interest around Grand Theft Auto 6 will ‚Äúdie down‚Äù almost completely if the game faces any more delays. In an interview with Esports Insider (as seen by Dexerto), York said:York cited fan reactions showing growing frustration, with some saying they ‚Äúdon‚Äôt even care anymore‚Äù because repeated delays keep letting them down.he added.The game‚Äôs delay from May to November 2026 even caused anger in Poland‚Äôs parliament, with an opposition lawmaker calling the postponement ‚Äúa huge scandal‚Äù during a session.Explaining Rockstar‚Äôs reason behind GTA 6 delay, York said:York believes Rockstar is aiming to meet very high internal standards and may not feel it has reached that level yet.York noted.Till date, Rockstar has released two official trailers of the highly anticiapted game which have confirmed that GTA 6 is set in a modern Vice City. The game will feature dual protagonists, deeper RPG systems, realistic physics, new heist tools and a more evolving open world.Rockstar has not announced the official price for India. However, early industry estimates suggest the standard edition may be priced around ‚Çπ9,000, which is much higher than GTA V‚Äôs console launch price of ‚Çπ3,499.
Article Summary: Former rockstar developer mike york warns that further delays to grand theft auto 6 could significantly diminish public interest. He believes rockstar is prioritizing polish to meet high expectations, but prolonged waits risk alienating fans. York anticipates a november 2026 release, citing it as an optimal period for sales.

Article Title: Zoho founder Sridhar Vembu responds to user asking about Arattai app: ‚ÄòWe will market it ‚Ä¶‚Äô
Article Text:
Arattai app: Features and challenges

One-to-one and group chats with text, voice notes, and media sharing

Audio and video calls with end-to-end encryption

Multi-device support, including desktop and Android TV apps

Stories and channels for broadcasting updates



Arattai app gets end-to-end encryption







Zoho founder Sridhar Vembu was recently asked by an X (formerly Twitter) user why there is no talk about Arattai now? The user quoted a post stating that Telegram is worth $30 billion with only 30 employees working from home, no office. Responding to the user‚Äôs question, Vembu shared that the company is doing ‚Äúupdates weekly‚Äù and is working on ‚Äúsome very important features‚Äù. ‚ÄúWe will market it more once we feel we are satisfied with the feature set!,‚Äù Vembu posted, adding ‚ÄúThis is a marathon. We are geared for it.‚ÄùTo recall, the Arattai app debuted in 2021 as a rival to Meta‚Äôs WhatsApp. Years after its launch, the app recently gained momentum after senior government ministers like Piyush Goyal joined the platform. In September this year, Arattai (meaning chat in Tamil) topped App Store ranking, registering 3,50,000 signs in just three days.Arattai offers familiar features such as:However, the app is still ironing out issues. Users have reported OTP delays, slower contact sync, and call glitches due to server overload.Last month, the company rolled out system-wide end-to-end encryption on the Arattai app. Announcing the release in an X post, Vembu then said that it is a ‚Äúforced upgrade on all because it is a drastic change‚Äù.‚ÄúWe had to do some redesign around it and we wanted extensive testing because it is a drastic change. It is now being tested by about 6,000 people in the company. We identified some issues and have fixed them. We are doing one more round of testing on a new build that has fixed the issues identified,‚Äù he then said.
Article Summary: Zoho founder sridhar vembu was recently asked by an x (formerly twitter) user why there is no talk about arattai now. The user quoted a post stating that telegram is worth $30 billion with only 30 employees working from home, no office. ‚Äúwe will market it more once we feel we are satisfied with the feature set!,‚Äù vem bu posted, adding ‚Äúthis is a marathon.

Article Title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra may come with Galaxy Z Fold 7-like camera island: Report
Article Text:
Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra expected launch date

The Fan Edition Is Back: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE First Impressions

Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra expected features





Samsung is reportedly gearing up for its next flagship cycle upgrade with the launch of Galaxy S26 series next year. In a latest leak, alleged photos of Galaxy S26 Ultra have appeared online, giving a hint at the camera design change with the upcoming Samsung phone. Images and a brief video posted by OnLeaks on X (formerly Twitter) reportedly shows a dummy Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra. While the overall shape of the handset seems identical to last year‚Äôs Galaxy S25 Ultra, the camera module appears to be updated with a new design similar to that of Galaxy Z Fold 7. In the leaked photos, one can see a raised camera island housing three camera sensors.Samsung unveiled its Galaxy S26 series in February 2025. While there is no official announcement from the company, it's expected that Samsung may carry forward its launch timeline in 2026 as well. The company may follow its three-model strategy, which may include the Galaxy S26, S26 Plus and the S26 Ultra.On the specifications front, Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra is expected to sport a 6.9-inch AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate and a peak brightness of 3,000 nits. Under the hood, the phone may come with a substantial performance boost by incorporating the latest Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. Like last year, this chipset may also be optimised for Galaxy phones.The processor will reportedly feature up to 16GB of RAM and internal storage options up to 1TB.Coming to the cameras, the Galaxy S26 Ultra is said to come with the best camera that the company has to offer. The quad camera setup is suggested to come with a 200MP primary sensor, 50MP ultra-wide camera, 50MP Telephoto camera lens with 5x optical zoom and an additional 10MP shooter. The handset is believed to run One UI 8.5 based on Android 16 out of the box.Coming to the battery, the smartphone is rumoured to pack a 5000mAh battery with support for 60W wired charging ‚Äì up from 45W in Galaxy S25 Ultra model ‚Äì and 20W wireless charging.
Article Summary: Images and a brief video posted by onleaks on x (formerly twitter) reportedly shows a dummy samsung galaxy s26 ultra. While the overall shape of the handset seems identical to last year‚Äôs galaxy s25 ultra, the camera module appears to be updated with a new design. In the leaked photos, one can see a raised camera island housing three camera sensors.

Article Title: New Year 2026: How to use WhatsApp new year stickers, video call effects and other features to make your celebrations more fun
Article Text:
How WhatsApp's new features can make your New Year celebrations more memorable



WhatsApp New Year stickers pack 2026



Steps to use the

2026 Sticker Pack

:

Go to any individual or group chat.

Click the emoji icon in the text area.

Switch to the Sticker tab (square icon w/ folded corner).

Scroll down until you see the 2026 pack of stickers or click ‚Äú+‚Äù to download.

- Tapping any sticker will instantly send the sticker to the chat box.

Use with text to create personalised New Year greetings.

Add video call effects



Usage of video call effects:

Begin a video call in a one-on-one or group setting.

Tap the ‚Äúeffects‚Äù icon on your screen (sparkle or magic wand).

Choose the available effects: firework, confetti, or stars.

Adjust the intensity or turn the effects on/off.

Enjoy your New Year call with additional graphic festivities.

Celebrate with animated confetti reactions



How to use animated confetti reactions

Open the conversation and choose the message to which you want to respond.

Tap and hold the message until the reaction menu appears.

See animated confetti appearing on the screen for all chat members.

Enhance status updates with animated stickers



How to use:

Open WhatsApp and switch to the ‚ÄúStatus‚Äù page.

Touch ‚ÄúMy Status‚Äù and choose a picture or video to set as the background.

Click the sticker icon on the top menu bar.

Select animated stickers, including the 2026 festive pack.

The sticker will change size and position by pinching or dragging.

Post your Status to share with all your contacts.

Tips for a smooth New Year celebration on WhatsApp



Start early: Make plans for the group messages and events. Avoid doing everything last-minute.

Control the number of people in a video call: If there are too many people in a video call, it may slow the connection speed.

Combine features: Use stickers, confetti reactions, and status updates all at once.

Keep it personal: Record personal voice messages or videos for friends who cannot be present in person. Notifications: Notify Notifications: Pin important messages so no one misses critical updates about timings or locations.

Safety tips: Share your live location with trusted friends and family only.





New Year's Eve is just around the corner, and is ready to knock at your door. With billions of messages and calls spreading across family, friends, and loved ones around the world Right from online get-togethers to exciting group messages, WhatsApp has a very important role to perform in enabling people to celebrate and share their New Year messages. This time around, WhatsApp has come up with party-themed features such as a 2026 sticker package, video call effects, animated confetti reactions, and animated status stickers to make celebrations more interactive and exciting. Below is a step-by-step guide to make use of these features in an effective way to make the New Year celebrations memorable for you.WhatsApp‚Äôs latest features are set to add extra sparkle to your New Year celebrations. From festive stickers and animated emojis to interactive video call effects, the messaging app is helping users connect in more fun and creative ways. Whether you‚Äôre sharing greetings with loved ones, joining virtual parties, or sending personalised messages, these tools make it easier to spread joy and capture memorable moments. With enhanced multimedia options and engaging interactive features, WhatsApp is turning ordinary chats into festive experiences, ensuring your New Year celebrations feel lively, connected, and unforgettable, no matter where you or your friends are in the world.Sticker messages are a great way of expressing emotions and wishes through fun stickers. The 2026 WhatsApp sticker set is made exclusively for the New Year. It will help the user express the feelings of celebration.Adding some stickers to the message gives the message an added touch of festivities and playfulness, especially when the message contains greetings to more than one friend or family member at the same timeVideo calling features prominently in virtual celebrations, mainly in the case of friends or family members who live in distant places.It makes online meetings very lively and interesting with energy and a festive feel.Animated confetti reactions let you instantly respond to messages or announcements with a visual celebration, enhancing interaction in chats.This is perfect for emphasising important events such as countdown messages of invitations to parties or celebrations and fun messages that bring smiles without requiring the user to type out a message,‚Äù states the designer.WhatsApp now allows animated stickers on Status updates, allowing users to share greetings or celebrations with movement, giving messages a dynamic touch.This serves to assist users in extending Happy New Year messages to their friends, even if they are not in their personal conversations.
Article Summary: How whatsapp's new features can make your new year celebrations more memorable. From festive stickers and animated emojis to interactive video call effects, the messaging app is helping users connect in more fun and creative ways. With enhanced multimedia options and engaging interactive features, whatsapp is turning ordinary chats into festive experiences.

Article Title: Before becoming Microsoft CEO, Satya Nadella faced the 'One rejection' Indian students fear most
Article Text:
Microsoft CEO 'Thrilled' About India's Growing Data Centre Capacity, Details Meet With PM Modi

Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella‚Äôs joinery from Manipal





Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella once shared his experience of how not going to IIT which he describes as the "the holy grail" for middle-class students became a turning point for him. The IIT rejection redirected his life towards a path only few could have imagined and which eventually led him to become the CEO of Microsoft, one of the world‚Äôs most valuable companies. Speaking to LinkedIn CEO Ryan Roslansky in 2023, Nadella revealed that as a teenage in Hyderabad his ambition revolved around cricket and banking. He said that he never thought of software. Nadella further added that like many of friends he also viewed IIT as the pinnacle of academic achievement. But when he failed to secure admission, Nadella faced a setback that could have easily defined his future. Instead, it became the catalyst for a different journey.Nadella described IIT as ‚Äúthe holy grail‚Äù for middle-class students, acknowledging the weight of expectations. Yet, he later reflected that not getting in forced him to explore other opportunities ones that ultimately shaped his resilience and adaptability.After getting rejected from IIT, Nadella got enrolled at the Manipal Institute of Technology, where he studied electrical engineering. The decision of taking admission in Manipal Institute of Technology set him on a trajectory that would take him to the University of Wisconsin‚ÄìMilwaukee for a master‚Äôs degree.After completing his masters he enrolled in the University of Chicago for an MBA.Nadella also recalled that after reaching the US he faced cultural shocks, homesickness and the challenge of proving himself in a new country. He said that he often joked about the fact that he simply cannot locate Milwaukee on a map before moving there. However, all these experiences helped him in building adaptability which later went ahead and defined his leadership style.Nadella joined Microsoft in 1992, after working at Sun Microsystems. Over, the next two decade he rose steadily through the ranks and the became the Microsoft CEO in 2014. When Nadella became the CEO, the company was facing a lot competition from Apple, Google and Amazon. However, under his leadership, Microsoft reinvented itself and it now a market valuation of $3.54 trillion.Nadella has often said that ‚Äúonly in America would someone like me get the chance to prove himself rather than be typecast based on the school I attended.‚Äù
Article Summary: Microsoft ceo satya nadella once shared his experience of how not going to iit which he describes as the "the holy grail" for middle-class students became a turning point for him. The iit rejection redirected his life towards a path only few could have imagined and which eventually led him to become the ceo of microsoft.

Article Title: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg's 'highest-paid' employee is reportedly unhappy with his Boss, feels he ...
Article Text:
Mark Zuckerberg (File Image)

Alexandr Wang is reportedly clashing with Meta‚Äôs old guard

Meta‚Äôs Secret AI Army: Top Talent Hired from OpenAI, Google & More

Alexandr Wang memo on Meta's massive AI restructure





In June this year, Facebook-parent Meta Platforms agreed to take a 49% stake in artificial intelligence (AI) startup Scale AI for $14.8 billion. As part of the deal, Scale AI CEO Alexandr Wang took top position inside Meta, leading the company's new ‚Äúsuperintelligence‚Äù lab, , Meta Superintelligence Labs, or MSL. The 28-year-old founder of Scale AI, Wang has been installed as the public face of Zuckerberg‚Äôs AI reboot. Mark Zuckerberg reportedly paid billions to bring billionaire AI prodigy Alexandr Wang on board. However, it reportedly seems that all is not well between the AI wunderkind and his Boss, Mark Zuckerberg. The 41-year-old Zuckerberg is said to have backed his new hires with nine-figure compensation packages to lure top researchers from rivals, igniting a Silicon Valley poaching war.According to a report in Financial Times, Wang privately believes that CEO Mark Zuckerberg‚Äôs micromanagement of the company‚Äôs AI push is "suffocating". Wang is said to have complained to associates that Zuckerberg‚Äôs tight grip on the effort is stifling progress, the report said, citing multiple people familiar with the situation. Report adds that cracks have begun to emerge at an executive level and that tensions have been bubbling between Wang and Zuckerberg for sometime now.As per the report, internally, some staff question whether Wang is out of his depth, given his lack of experience managing teams in a large corporation but also his expertise in AI data services rather than as an AI researcher pushing technical breakthroughs.Incidentally, Alexander Wang‚Äôs arrival at Meta has created friction over the company's fundamental approach to AI development, with his superintelligence team pushing to make the company‚Äôs next model ‚Äúclosed‚Äù ‚Äî keeping its technology secret. This is said to mark a major departure from Meta‚Äôs longtime philosophy of open-sourcing its models for other developers to build upon, causing some old guard members to chafe at the change, the Times reported.The new leadership has chosen to abandon Meta‚Äôs previous frontier model called Behemoth, which saw its release delayed last spring after disappointing performance tests. Meta‚Äôs AI division faces a dramatic four-way split as Meta reorganizes into groups focused on research, superintelligence development, products, and infrastructure, according to the report.As the new vision and leadership have crystallised, some top names have left. Among them, in recent weeks, Meta‚Äôs longtime chief legal officer Jennifer Newstead was poached by arch-rival Apple, while chief revenue officer John Hegeman announced he too was leaving to launch a start-up.Similarly, chief AI scientist and Turing Award winner Yann LeCun is departing Meta to launch a new AI initiative. He had reportedly taken exception at having to report to Wang. Another reason cited for his resignation is that his longer-term research was reportedly hit hard by the recent cuts announced at Meta.Meta reorganized its AI teams in June this year. The memo said that most team leaders will report directly to 28-year-old Wang. This included investor and former GitHub CEO Nat Friedman, who heads MSL's product team and was announced as an MSL leader alongside Wang in June. In the email sent to employees, Wang wrote that "superintelligence is coming," and to "take it seriously," Meta needs to make major changes. This includes establishing four distinct teams that focus on research, training, products, and infrastructure.The reorganisation is the latest in a series of AI reorgs for Meta. Incidentally, Meta had already dissolved two major AI teams in the past six months.
Article Summary: Alexandr wang is reportedly clashing with meta‚Äôs old guard. Mark zuckerberg reportedly paid billions to bring billionaire ai prodigy alexandr wang on board. Wang is said to have complained to associates that zuckerberg's tight grip on the effort is stifling progress.

Article Title: Meta AI chief Alexandr Wang says will have kids only after Elon Musk‚Äôs Neuralink ‚Ä¶
Article Text:
Here‚Äôs what Alexandr Wang said about Elon Musk's Neuralink

‚ÄúBillionaire Alexandr Wang says he wants to wait to have kids until Neuralink is very advanced, because children‚Äôs brains in the first seven years are more flexible and can learn brain-computer interfaces, unlocking more potential than adult brains

Speaking on a podcast, Wang explained that he wants to wait until Neuralink or similar BCI technology is reliable and widely available. His reasoning is that children born into such a world could integrate the technology directly into their developing brains, rather than having to adapt to it later in life

He pointed to neuroplasticity, the brain‚Äôs heightened ability to form neural connections in early childhood, arguing that during the first ~7 years, children could learn to use brain-computer interfaces in ways adults simply cannot

At a deeper level, Wang‚Äôs comments reflect a broader concern: artificial intelligence is advancing at an exponential pace, while human biological evolution is slow. He suggests that direct neural links to AI may eventually be necessary for humans to remain cognitively competitive in a future shaped by superintelligence.‚Äù

Meta‚Äôs Secret AI Army: Top Talent Hired from OpenAI, Google & More

Meta‚Äôs Superintelligence Lab is hiring in Singapore

Read Meta chief AI Alexandr Wang's full memo to employees

‚ÄúIt's never an easy decision to say goodbye to colleagues. These are talented people who have worked extremely hard and contributed to our Al effort. Anyone in North America whose role was impacted has already been notified. Those who may be impacted in EMEA have been notified and remain subject to consultation,‚Äù Wang said.

‚ÄúThis by no means signals any decrease in investment. In fact, we will continue to hire industry-leading Al-native talent. Our goal is to enable MSL to move faster. We remain excited about the models we are training, our ambitious compute plans, and the products we are building, and I'm confident in our path to superintelligence,‚Äù he added.





Alexandr Wang, the head of Meta‚Äôs artificial intelligence division ‚Äî SuperIntelligence Labs has now gave a new statement on his plans of having kids. Speaking at The Shawn Rayan Show, Wang said that he wait until Elon Musk ‚Äôs Neuralink or similar brain‚Äëcomputer interface (BCI) technology is highly advanced before having children. Wang is of the opinion that child neuroplasticity offers the best window for adopting brain‚Äëcomputer interfaces, and that future generations could grow up learning to use superintelligence tools intuitively. ‚ÄúI‚Äôll have kids after Neuralink is very advanced, because children‚Äôs brains in the first seven years are more flexible and can learn brain-computer interfaces, unlocking more potential than adult brains,‚Äù said Wang.Tesla CEO Elon Musk founded Neuralink is presently conducting clinical trials and is working at restoring mobility for patients with paralysis. Musk has long promoted the idea of expanding the technology to enhance human cognition. Wang‚Äôs remarks highlight how some tech leaders see BCIs not just as medical tools, but as essential upgrades for future generations.Meta Superintelligence Lab (MSL), the billion-dollar team that Mark Zuckerberg created to take on Google and OpenAI in artificial intelligence (AI), is hiring. Alexandr Wang, the head of the team and Chief AI officer of Meta, has announced that the company is hiring for its team in Singapore. This comes hours after the social media giant acquired Manus AI, a Singapore-based company working on AI agents.‚ÄúMSL is hiring in Singapore! We already have some amazing researchers and engineers there, buoyed now by the 100-strong Manus team, and we‚Äôre growing fast,‚Äù Wang said in a post on X (formerly Twitter). ‚ÄúFeel free to DM with a resum√© if interested!,‚Äù he added.In the memo, Alexandr Wang writes:
Article Summary: Alexandr wang, the head of meta‚Äôs artificial intelligence division ‚Äî superintelligence labs has now gave a new statement on his plans of having kids. Wang said that he wait until elon musk ‚Äôs neuralink or similar brain‚Äëcomputer interface (bci) technology is highly advanced before having children.

Article Title: When Steve Jobs sent an 'angry email' to Adobe CEO Bruce Chizen; said: One of us must change our ‚Ä¶
Article Text:
Here's the email Steve Jobs sent to Adobe CEO

From: Steve Jobs

Sent: Thursday, May 26, 2005 9:36 AM

To: Bruce Chizen

Subject: Recruiting

Bruce,

Adobe is recruiting from Apple. They have hired one person already and are calling lots more. I have a standing policy with our recruiters that we don't recruit from Adobe. It seems you have a different policy. One of us must change our policy. Please let me know who.

Steve

Adobe CEO's reply to Steve Jobs





Adobe and Apple have been allies and rivals through the ages. Apple and Adobe have a long history of both agreement and opposition. They've been closely linked since the early days of desktop publishing, often with complementary product lines and common customers. But the two have also fought publicly on numerous occasions. Apple and Adobe's fight over Flash technology after Apple kinda 'banned' Flash on iPhones.Another of this Apple vs Adobe tale is Steve Jobs‚Äô email to Adobe CEO Bruce Chizen in 2005. Bruce Chizen was Adobe's CEO from 2000 to 2007. The story goes that Steve Jobs got information on Apple employees being poached by Adobe. Jobs reportedly believed that the two companies had a total non-poaching agreement in place. So Jobs is said to have decided to cut out the middle man and went straight to the big boss with a scathing email. Below are the email exchanges between the two CEOs that were made public in court documents following a 2010 antitrust lawsuit over tech companies' supposed agreements to 'Not Cold Call' each other's employees for hiring purposes. It is against the law in the US to collude with other companies about hiring. Adobe, Apple, Google and Intel had to pay $415 million to settle the suit.On May 26, 2005, at 4:15 PM, Bruce Chizen wrote:I thought we agreed not to recruit any senior level employees (at Adobe this is Sr. Director/VP and represents about 2% of the population). I am pretty sure your recruiters have approached ,more junior ones.I would propose we keep it this way. Open to discuss. It would be good to agree.
Article Summary: Adobe and apple have a long history of both agreement and opposition. Steve jobs reportedly believed that the two companies had a total non-poaching agreement in place. Jobs is said to have decided to cut out the middle man and went straight to the big boss with a scathing email.
